name: Standard
description: Basic trim with essential features and standard equipment.

name: Sport
description: Enhanced performance features, sporty design, and agile handling.

name: Luxe
description: Luxury amenities, superior comfort, and advanced technology features.

name: Premium
description: Top-tier luxury and technology, with the highest level of features.

name: Eco
description: Focused on fuel efficiency and eco-friendly technology, such as hybrids or electrics.

name: Adventure
description: Off-road capabilities, rugged design, and outdoor-oriented features.

name: Executive
description: High-end luxury, focusing on comfort and prestigious amenities.

name: Special Edition
description: Limited production runs with unique features or commemorative elements.

name: Performance
description: High power output, sport-tuned mechanics, and performance-oriented features.

name: Custom
description: Bespoke features and personalized design options for individual preference.
